content.p: Being a top 100 global university with influence and impact on an international knowledge economy depends on the passion and commitment of all of its leaders, members and champions. University Council has a key role to play in the stewardship of the University helping it to fulfil its mission and ensure ongoing integration with and impact in all the communities that the University is part of locally and globally. These web pages share with you the work of University Council, introduce Council members – key ambassadors for the University – and provide information for how you too can support The University of Nottingham to sustain its position as an international leader in education. Find out about individual members of University Council There are many ways for individuals and organisations to help support the ongoing success of The University of Nottingham. Serving on Council is just one way. Other opportunities include: Registrar's Office, Trent Building University of Nottingham, University Park Nottingham NG7 2RD telephone: +44 (0) 115 951 5761 fax: +44 (0) 115 951 5739 email: registrars@nottingham.ac.uk
